column5: Greetings Where can I get good Roe...Not the crap they sell at BP. Im all out! Any thoughts!....Even if its loose I will tie my own (prefer this). Thanks

go out with pink worms and flies and things that look like roe until you catch a hen....then skein her out....or maybe talk to a fish hatchery in the area or even a local tackle store will prolly have a bit of rainbow or chinook roe kickin around....good luck
But do you have Roe for him Rob???
You may have to fish a bit with artificials until you're able to harvest a fish with eggs for yourself.
With all this employment talk here lately, I thought you were asking how to get your R.O.E. (Record of Employment)... I think I need a holiday! HH
Do you have any roe 4 sale? I need some to hold me over till I hit a hen.... and yes boys some time pinkies rule the day! just wanna be prepared for days when roe rules!
